title: Rana Qasim condemns Indian army chief’s statement
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 17 (APP):The chairman of Kashmir committee Rana Qasim Muhammad Noon condemning the statement of Indian army chief and defense minister pertaining to Pakistan said that the statement was given to mislead the world community.
“The Indian forces have illegally incarcerated the Hurriyat leaders and inflicted oppression on the Kashmiri people,” the chairman said in his message issued by his office following the meeting of Kashmir committee.
The chairman emphasized that Kashmir was the jugular vein of Pakistan, highlighting that the martyred Kashmiris are laid to rest draped in the Pakistani flag.
He urges the United Nations to implement its resolution in Indian Occupied Jammu and Kashmir and ensure the due right of self-determination of the Kashmiri people.
The chairman reiterated its resolve to raise the Kashmir dispute at global fora until the independence of Kashmir.
